sources.title: Good Girl, Bad Girl (ACTION FILM in German, full feature film for free, full-length action film)

metadata.Plot: Vanessa and Maria are twins, although not so identical...Maria is a nun while Vanessa is a go go dancer. Leading very different lives, they don't interact much, however they are forced to switch lives when Vanessa is chased by Gromek, a powerful drug dealer. The girls must stop Gromek and also save the monastery Maria lives in from being sold.
metadata.Writer: Andreas Brune, Sven Frauenhoff, Sabine Leipert
metadata.Actors: Julia Stinshoff, Nick Brimble, Graham McTavish
